materials: Cell Phones; Ni-Cd Batteries; Li-Ion Batteries; Ni-MH Batteries; Ni-Zn Batteries; Small Sealed Lead Acid Batteries; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: As the first national retailer to partner with Call2Recycle, RadioShack is at the forefront of the rechargeable battery recycling cause and is pleased to offer battery recycling at thousands of convenient RadioShack locations for free.  Simply drop them off at your local RadioShack and theyll take care of the rest.  Ask a store associate for more details.

name: Home Depot
materials: Compact Fluorescent Lights; Batteries (Rechargeable); Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Home Depot accepts compact fluorescent bulbs and used power tool rechargeable batteries. Look for the orange drop boxes, usually located near the front entrance near the customer service desk.
